title: Education
intro: I have always enjoyed studying, analysing and truly understanding the concepts I am working with. After finishing University I have never stopped learning myself and I also completed lots of various courses on web development topics.

records.title: Computer Science, Bachelor's degree
records.description:
I studied Computer Science full-time in Vilnius University Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics. Not only I enjoyed this period of my life, but also most of the time I was Nr.1 student of the entire course and during all 4 years of studies received an Enlarged Grant for high study results.

Read more about my studies in Vilnius University »

records.title: Mathematics and Mathematics Applications Studies
records.description: Lithuanian School for Young Mathematicians is a remote studies programme maintained by Vilnius University Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics with a final problem-solving competition held in Vilnius University. The programme covers various mathematical topics and problems that are more complex that the ones required for Final National Exams, in fact, it can be considered as serious preparation for Maths and Computer Science Studies in Vilnius University. I completed the programme in addition to my Secondary Education.

records.title: Secondary Education
records.description: Secondary Education takes 12 years in Lithuania, finished by series of Final National Exams. I chose to study a technical set of subjects and several foreign languages and completed Vilniu A.Puškin school with honours by earning excellent grades in all of the subjects.

records.title: Developer Training - Core Platform
records.description: A week long developer training course on Hybris platform mostly consisting of practical exercises.

records.title: Programming Web Applications for Mobile Devices
records.description: An online 6 weeks long course covering Optimisation, Progressive Enhancement, Web(?) APIs, PhoneGap(?). The course was delivered by W3DevCampus - W3C Online Training for Developers and required a successful completion of relatively large tasks during 6 weeks, I finished with a final grade of 99.33%.

records.title: MongoDB for Node.js Developers
records.description: This 8 week long course is maintained by creators of MongoDB and contains a wide range of hands-on exercises every week, covering a no SQL databases principles and MongoDB in particular. By successfully submitting all the solutions on time I was able to complete the course with a excellent grade of 100%.

records.title: Digital Analytics Fundamentals
records.description: During this course I explored a lot of Google Analytics features and learnt new ways of digesting and analysing the data.
